phoneVerify.title: PHONE VERIFICATION
phoneVerify.registerPhoneNumber: Please enter the registered phone number.
phoneVerify.codeSentTo: A verification code has been sent to
phoneVerify.warning: Phone number is important to access your account. If you change your registered phone number, be sure to change your number on settings beforehand. OTP(One Time Password) number will be send only to your current registered number. If you can't receive OTP via phone, you must reset your account using 24 words that you backed up.

kyc.notice: All the information must be written in English
kyc.realIdentity: You must use your valid identity in this verification process. Your personal information will be securely protected.
kyc.identityDocDesc: All proofs must use internationally identifiable documents.(Passport, government identification card, etc.)
kyc.failToUploadMessage: The image is too small or too big.
kyc.noExpireDate: My document doesn't have an expiration date
kyc.proofDocDesc: which shall include a unique identification number, such as an identity card number, birth certificate number or passport number
kyc.selfieDesc: Your selfie must include your identity document (clearly visible)
kyc.residencyInfoDesc: Your residence information must be in English to enable international verification
kyc.provinceInfo: In case of Canada or US, insert State abbreviations
kyc.checkKycLegal: I hereby confirm that I unconditionally accept and agree to comply with the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy.
kyc.checkKycLegalDetail: I understand that if I do not accept and agree to these documents, I acknowledge and agree that I shall: (i) immediately exit from and not use the mobile or web-based platform; (ii) not download the mobile application, or if I have already done so, then delete the mobile application from my device; and/or (iii) not seek in any fashion to access and/or use the token platform.
kyc.kycVerifying: Your Information is waiting for verification
kyc.termsOfUseOfMDEX: Terms of Use of M.DEX Services
kyc.agreement: I hereby confirm that I unconditionally accept and agree to comply with the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy. I understand that if I do not accept and agree to these documents, I acknowledge and agree that I shall: (i) immediately exit from and not use the mobile or web-based platform; (ii) not download the mobile application, or if I have already done so, then delete the mobile application from my device; and/or (iii) not seek in any fashion to access and/or use the token platform.
kyc.kycNotVerifiedYet: Your KYC process hasn't been submitted or approved yet. You are not allowed to buy or sell MUI without KYC approval!

referrals.notice: Invite your friends and every time a friend completes a KYC, get 5 MUI tokens for free!

airdrop.paused: The Airdrop Smart Contract is paused.
airdrop.invalidInfo: Can't be claimed because the information is invalid.
airdrop.none: There is no airdrop to claim. Please join airdrop through KYC registration and referral.

warnings.wrongPasswordTrial: You have entered your password incorrect {{times}} times. If you enter your password incorrect 5 times, you will be logged out automatically!

warnings.serviceFee: * Your MUI balance is less than {{minMui}} MUI. You will be charged by service fee of {{serviceFee}} ether for the transaction.
warnings.assetApproval: In order to trade or transfer your assets through SovereignWallet Network services, you need to allow our smart contracts to transfer your assets on behalf of you. For further details about token allowance please see 'https://tokenallowance.io'
